question_text: Which of the following statements are true of mobile hotspots? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: They require a cellular data connection
They use Wi-Fi to connect other devices
They only support one device at a time
They function as a gateway between cellular and local networks
They can replace an ISP for home internet in some cases
correct_answer: They require a cellular data connection
They use Wi-Fi to connect other devices
They function as a gateway between cellular and local networks
They can replace an ISP for home internet in some cases
explanation: Mobile hotspots use cellular data and act as Wi-Fi access points for other devices. They can serve as home internet alternatives, especially in rural or mobile scenarios.
